description: Returns a list of orderable DB instance options for the specified engine.

parameters.name: Engine
parameters.description: The name of the engine to retrieve DB instance options for.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: This parameter is not currently supported. (dict) --- This type is not currently supported. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: This parameter is not currently supported.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: This parameter is not currently supported.

parameters.name: MaxRecords
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to include in the response. If more records exist than the specified MaxRecords value, a pagination token called a marker is included in the response so that the remaining results can be retrieved. Default: 100 Constraints: Minimum 20, maximum 100.

nested_items.name: OrderableDBInstanceOptions
nested_items.description: An  OrderableDBInstanceOption structure containing information about orderable options for the DB instance.

nested_items.name: Engine
nested_items.description: The engine type of a DB instance.

nested_items.name: EngineVersion
nested_items.description: The engine version of a DB instance.

nested_items.name: DBInstanceClass
nested_items.description: The DB instance class for a DB instance.

nested_items.name: LicenseModel
nested_items.description: The license model for a DB instance.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZones
nested_items.description: A list of Availability Zones for a DB instance.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the availability zone.

nested_items.name: MultiAZCapable
nested_items.description: Indicates whether a DB instance is Multi-AZ capable.

nested_items.name: ReadReplicaCapable
nested_items.description: Indicates whether a DB instance can have a Read Replica.

nested_items.name: Vpc
nested_items.description: Indicates whether a DB instance is in a VPC.

nested_items.name: SupportsStorageEncryption
nested_items.description: Indicates whether a DB instance supports encrypted storage.

nested_items.name: StorageType
nested_items.description: Not applicable. In Neptune the storage type is managed at the DB Cluster level.

nested_items.name: SupportsIops
nested_items.description: Indicates whether a DB instance supports provisioned IOPS.

nested_items.name: SupportsEnhancedMonitoring
nested_items.description: Indicates whether a DB instance supports Enhanced Monitoring at intervals from 1 to 60 seconds.

nested_items.name: SupportsIAMDatabaseAuthentication
nested_items.description: Indicates whether a DB instance supports IAM database authentication.

nested_items.name: SupportsPerformanceInsights
nested_items.description: (Not supported by Neptune)

nested_items.name: MinStorageSize
nested_items.description: Minimum storage size for a DB instance.

nested_items.name: MaxStorageSize
nested_items.description: Maximum storage size for a DB instance.

nested_items.name: MinIopsPerDbInstance
nested_items.description: Minimum total provisioned IOPS for a DB instance.

nested_items.name: MaxIopsPerDbInstance
nested_items.description: Maximum total provisioned IOPS for a DB instance.

nested_items.name: MinIopsPerGib
nested_items.description: Minimum provisioned IOPS per GiB for a DB instance.

nested_items.name: MaxIopsPerGib
nested_items.description: Maximum provisioned IOPS per GiB for a DB instance.

nested_items.name: SupportsGlobalDatabases
nested_items.description: A value that indicates whether you can use Neptune global databases with a specific combination of other DB engine attributes.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: An optional pagination token provided by a previous OrderableDBInstanceOptions request. If this parameter is specified, the response includes only records beyond the marker, up to the value specified by MaxRecords .
